sentences.en: "How much is he paying you?" — "Oh, five thousand." —"Not bad."
A court at Tampa, Florida has convicted five officials on drugs charges.
sentences.cn: 佛罗里达州坦帕市法庭判决5名官员的毒品交易罪名成立。

sentences.en: A string of five rowing boats set out from the opposite bank.
sentences.cn: 5只划艇排成一行从对岸出发了。

sentences.en: Charlie was earning eight pounds, I was earning five.
sentences.cn: 查利赚了8英镑，我赚了5英镑。

sentences.en: Five whole pages of script were devoted to rubbishing her political opponents.
sentences.cn: 整整5页讲稿都是对她的政敌的诋毁。

sentences.en: He was jailed for five years as an alleged British spy.
sentences.cn: 他被指控为英国间谍，入狱关押了5年。

sentences.en: He will actually be serving three concurrent five-year sentences.
sentences.cn: 实际上，他将服3个5年徒刑，合并执行。

sentences.en: I’ll be back by five (= five o’clock ) .
It was five long miles to the nearest pub.
sentences.cn: 离最近的酒吧有长长的5英里的路程。

sentences.en: Moreau took gold in the five-kilometre individual pursuit competition.
sentences.cn: 莫罗在个人五公里追逐赛中获得金牌。

sentences.en: Not long afterward she received five calls in one day.
sentences.cn: 不久之后，她一天内就接到了5个电话。

sentences.en: The average commuter journey there is five hours long.
sentences.cn: 那里的通勤一族平均上下班要花5个小时。

sentences.en: The family moved to Canada when he was five (= five years old ) .
sentences.cn: 他五岁时全家移居加拿大。

sentences.en: The five survivors eventually reached safety, ragged, half-starved and exhausted.
sentences.cn: 5位幸存者最终到达安全之地时已经衣衫褴褛、饥肠辘辘、精疲力尽。

sentences.en: The story starts back in 1950, when I was five.
sentences.cn: 故事可以追溯到1950年，那时我才5岁。

sentences.en: There is also a golf course five miles away.
sentences.cn: 五英里外还有个高尔夫球场。

sentences.en: Water can be purified by boiling for five minutes.
sentences.cn: 水煮沸5分钟便可得到净化。

sentences.en: When I was your age I walked five miles to school.
sentences.cn: 我像你这么大时，要步行5英里去上学。

words.tran_cn: 五件东西；五个人一组；有五人参加的游戏

phrases.tran_cn: 五百分（牌戏，一种以得500分为胜局的游戏）
n. 五官感觉（指视、听、触、嗅、味五种感觉）
击掌，表示庆祝胜利，加油
